item.title: Economics of Information Exchange
item.description: Remaining economically relevant in the digital age requires accelerating how fast you create and communicate new information.

item.title: About
item.description:
I get pretty excited about everything computers. Making everyone smarter and more creative while fighting complexity at escherthink.com. You’ll probably find me thinking about some new idea or topic that preferably is not too mainstream.

With this website I am creating my own corner of the internet. Modern social media is pretty shit tbh, and making a website has never been easier. So instead of building my digital home on ground I would be renting I am building it on land I do own. I recommend you do the same, also because it is actually quite fun.
